@graph.name: Vegan Pumpkin Chocolate Chip Cookies - Vegan Richa
@graph.description: Vegan Pumpkin Chocolate Chip Cookies. Use chocolate chips on the Pumpkin cookies to make your favorite Halloween insects. Vegan Cookie Recipe

@graph.name: Vegan Pumpkin Chocolate Chip Cookies
@graph.description: Vegan Pumpkin Chocolate Chip Cookies. Use chocolate chips on the Pumpkin cookies to make your favorite Halloween insects or other things! Vegan Cookie Recipe. Makes 5 or 6 large cookies
recipeIngredient: 1/4 cup pumpkin puree (not pumpkin pie mix)
2 Tbsp almond butter  (or other nut or seed butter or you can use refined coconut oil)
1/2 cup spelt flour  (or wheat pastry flour)
2 to 4 Tbsp mini chocolate chips and chocolate chunks for pressing into the cookies

recipeInstructions.text: In a bowl, mix all the wet ingredients until well combined.
recipeInstructions.name: In a bowl, mix all the wet ingredients until well combined.

recipeInstructions.text: In another bowl, whisk all the dry ingredients.
recipeInstructions.name: In another bowl, whisk all the dry ingredients.

recipeInstructions.text: Add dry to wet and make a soft dough. if the dough is too sticky, add a tbsp or so more flour and mix in. Add 2 Tbsp mini chocolate chips and mix in. * For regular cookies where you dont plan to press in chocolate on the cookies later, mix in 1/4 cup chocolate chips.
recipeInstructions.name: Add dry to wet and make a soft dough. if the dough is too sticky, add a tbsp or so more flour and mix in. Add 2 Tbsp mini chocolate chips and mix in. * For regular cookies where you dont plan to press in chocolate on the cookies later, mix in 1/4 cup chocolate chips.

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F / 180ºc
recipeInstructions.name: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F / 180ºc

recipeInstructions.text: Take the dough and divide it into equal balls, Make flat balls and place on parchment lined baking sheet. Press the ball to make a thin cookie. Press chocolate chunks or chips into the shaped cookies to make desired insects, skull, pumpkin etc shapes.
recipeInstructions.name: Take the dough and divide it into equal balls, Make flat balls and place on parchment lined baking sheet. Press the ball to make a thin cookie. Press chocolate chunks or chips into the shaped cookies to make desired insects, skull, pumpkin etc shapes.

recipeInstructions.text: Bake for 13 to 15 minutes. The center will be somewhat soft but should be dry and not doughy.
recipeInstructions.name: Bake for 13 to 15 minutes. The center will be somewhat soft but should be dry and not doughy.

recipeInstructions.text: Cool the cookies for 15 minutes, then remove from the baking sheet. Cool completely and refrigerate for an hour before serving.
recipeInstructions.name: Cool the cookies for 15 minutes, then remove from the baking sheet. Cool completely and refrigerate for an hour before serving.
